name: Tempest UserBot
description: Tempest UB Is A Multifunctional Telegram Userbot with Custom Settings.

API_ID.description: Login here -> my.telegram.org to get pair of keys

API_HASH.description: Again You Will Find This Here ->  my.telegram.org

SESSION.description: Visit @TempestSupports and Use #strings or Generate From @TempestSessionBot

TRIGGER.description: This Is The Command Triggering Button Of Your All Commands. You Can Change It To -> [ . , ? ' / + - * ] Any Symbol That You Like.

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Your heroku api key, Go To Heroku Dashboard >> Profile Icon >> Account settings >> Scroll Down >> Reveal >> Tap, Hold & Copy.

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Your Heroku app name, Look Top First Slot You Have Just Filled At The Top, That's The Value.

TIME_ZONE.description: For Time Plugin. Change It To Your Time Zone or If You Don't Know Leave As it is.

LOG_CHAT.description: A Private Telegram Group Id To Store Your Logs.

TOKEN.description: Go to @Botfather in telegram and make a new bot and get the bot token.
